Summary: L:arge red light hovers over neighbors house followed by red orange spheres
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Oak Lawn
There were no other sightings in Oak Lawn on or around July 4th 2011
divs: sighting detailslarge stationary red square light hovered over the house next door. i was already outside for awhile busy watering flowers and vegetables while watching the sky for all the fireworks all around. i did not see this light earlier and it took me by surprise. at first, i thought it was a huge firework that was ready to explode but it did not. then i thought maybe it could be airplane but it did not move for awhile and did not have any blinkers or flashing faa lights. it made no noise. this object was very low and as it just hovered there a small plane did fly by. the object was from my vantage point as large trash totter. it just hovered and slowly then dissolved into a tiny faint transparent ball that moved across the yards in a straight line and just sat in the sky across the yard until it disappeared. a couple of minutes later i sat down facing west and i saw while there was fireworks and airline traffic in the skies what looked like smooth round balls of very red\orange lights coming up from the horizon and flowing up together in unison around the cresent moon. the moon was orange at that time. there were several of these and it went on for a couple of minutes. they did not explode or anything. they seemed following eachother and to be dancing and then they would slowly just disappear and then others would follow. these objects must have been large because these were out in the distance but very defined.
